articles.title: 'They were victims, too': Indonesian mother forgives teen suicide bombers who killed her sons - AsiaOne
articles.description: Wenny Angelina Hudojo’s older child Evan would have turned 15 this year, celebrating his birthday with mum, dad and younger brother Nathan at their home in Surabaya, Indonesia . But the occasion on August 29 was marked with prayers and flowers set on his grav…

articles.title: Economic Costs Accumulate as Countries Worried by Delta Variant Extend Border Closures - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Companies delay investments and cut jobs as strict travel limits, especially in Asia, weigh on sectors from manufacturing to education
articles.content: The economic damage from Covid-19 travel restrictions is piling up, with more companies holding back on large investments or postponing decisions as border closures and visa delays stymie operations … [+380 chars]
